Title: Katherine Lee Morse
Body: Information & Computer Science, University of California, Irvine , 1996 Ph.D. Information & Computer Science, University of California, Irvine , in progress (1997 or 1998; see the Number One Lie Told by Graduate Students ) Research My research is on improving the performance of Large Scale Distributed Simulations through Interest Management, aka data subscription, data distribution management, or relevance filtering.
